display_long_description:
# Limited Time Offer: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate one-month trial
**For new Game Pass Members only, while supplies last.**

**To claim this offer, install and open the Xbox app in your Meta Quest headset during this promotional period. Make sure your headset is updated to the latest software version. If the Xbox app is already in your library, try uninstalling it and downloading it again.**

Redeem Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscription at Microsoft.com/redeem. Valid payment method required. Unless you cancel, you will be charged the then-current regular membership rate when the promotional period ends. Subject to the Microsoft Services Agreement, Game Pass terms, and system requirements. Stream games on supported devices (xbox.com/cloud-devices) with the Xbox app; requires high-speed internet; streaming limits apply, server availability and wait times may vary. Select regions (xbox.com/regions). xbox.com/subscriptionterms.

**The Experience:**

Stream hundreds of high-quality games like Halo Infinite, Forza Motorsport and Starfield on a massive 2D virtual display with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate. Immerse yourself in an Xbox-themed virtual space or view your physical surroundings with stereoscopic full-color Passthrough.* With games added all the time, there’s always something new to play.

For more information, please see our support page:
(https://www.meta.com/help/quest/articles/in-vr-experiences/oculus-apps/xbox-cloud-gaming/)

*Color Passthrough not available on the Meta Quest 2
